title: Windows Update XP x86x64 Freeze Fix
description:
Fix I made for Windows Update freezing when downloading updates! Works for both 32bit and 64bit Windows XP!

What This Does.. 

I've created a set of .bat (MS-DOS batch) files that register about 40 .dll files to your copy of windows.. these files need to be registered in order for Windows Update to work (Mainly the file "wups2.dll") 

what this partly automated package does is stop automatic update while it registers the necessary .dll files and then restarts the automatic update service!

i created this becuase i needed it myself, so it's been tested and I made sure it completely works before releasing it! :) 

-enjoy
